title: Dex - Push Back Hero Bot
description: The official Hero Bot for the 2025-2026 Push Back season. Features floating intake arms, conveyor system for block transport, and versatile scoring mechanisms for all goal types.
features: Floating intake arms with rubber band tension
Internal conveyor system for block transport
Scores in long goals and upper/lower center goals

title: Precision Throwing Robot
description: Unique design featuring a motorized arm that throws blocks into goals one at a time. Focuses on precise placement for control bonuses rather than high-volume scoring.

title: High-Speed Six-Motor Drive
description: Popular drive configuration using six motors and 2.75-inch wheels for maximum speed and maneuverability. Includes gear train for RPM adjustment.

title: Multi-Position Latch Wing
description: Innovative mechanism achieving multiple precise positions (down, up, middle) for descoring blocks and staying within size constraints. Uses pneumatic cylinders with mechanical stops.

title: Alliance Double-Park Platform
description: Mechanism allowing an alliance partner to drive onto the robot, facilitating the 30-point double park bonus at match end. Critical for maximizing end-game points.

title: Defensive Wedge Design
description: Low-profile wedge mechanism for defensive play. Gets inside opponent drives to interfere with movement and protect alliance scoring opportunities.
